name: There Here For The Bear
description:
Not so much a game as a bit of fun . If you are gamer over 10 you will probably complete it in 5mins, If you are under ten (or over 40) it will probably take you 10.  (and Pc only). there are also lots glitches

Background:

one morning Brewy and the bear wake up to find all their friends have been turned into zombies by Zombie Aliens. The very same Zombie Aliens that want to kidnap Bear and and use him to make fizzy drink on their home planet.  

As the game starts a few of the Aliens nab the bear and beam him to a prison under the Mother ship, DB1. Brewy has 15mins before the first barrels reach the ship, and they beam poor little Bear on board for a good probing.... to learn his secrets.

Mean while Brewy has to battle his way through the Streets of Norwichton splating zombies with icecream and frozen gelato...who knew. He also has use of giant Norfolk fudge Balls,that explode, flaming rubber chickens, that explode and the Spectral Axe Nuns (from last weeks exorcism) guess what,,,they explode, which is handy.
